testsuite.name: View discussion page

testcase.name: View discussion page should return a 200 when requested
View discussion page should return a 200 when requesting the PDF of the discussion
View discussion page should return a 200 when requesting a specific message in the discussion
View discussion page should return a 200 when requesting inline comments for a discussion
View discussion page should return a 200 when requesting the report abuse popup
View discussion page should return a 200 when reporting abuse
View discussion page should return a 200 when requesting the lock popup
View discussion page should return a 302 when locking the discussion
View discussion page should return a 302 when unlocking the discussion
